tweet: Since the beginning of the pandemic, Florida has prohibited COVID-positive patients from being readmitted to LTC facilities. Since April, our state has established 12 COVID-dedicated nursing facilities, where COVID-positive LTC patients can safely recuperate.  https://t.co/u9HYCYgsUN
